text:
Vadio (http://www.vadio.com/jobs)

Positions: Backend Engineer

Location: Portland, OR (ONSITE)

Vadio powers online video experiences. We make it possible for people to enjoy music videos where they already listen to music by providing an online video platform to media companies across four continents.

http://www.vadio.com/jobs/position/bAoN0CAiCr5zn2dG1ZS6tF
